name: Chores with Cranberry
description:
Cranberry The Robot Vacuum is hardworking and doing its best but needs some assistance from time to time. Help it by removing the small pieces of furniture on its way and directing it to the hard-to-reach corners if needed.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

Press and hold SPACE to grab and move the highlighted objects.

Created by Oleksiy and Olha for The Indie Tales Jam, and we hope you'll have fun!
